title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Peer Learning and Project-Based Computer Graphics Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve the completeness of computer graphics projects by at least 80% through peer feedback

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
